overview: Mark leads Operations, Engineering, Safety, Supply Chain, Maintenance, and IT at Voltaix. Mark joined Voltaix in 2004 and has more than 18 years of experience managing operations, engineering, process development, and R&D in various capacities at public and private companies, including Cabot Corp., Molten Metal Technology, and Pelias Therapeutics, where he also served on the board of directors. He is the founder and Chairman of Impact Technology Consultants, a technology development firm that over the past nine years has helped over 60 companies achieve rapid growth through technology commercialization and implementation of structured work processes. He holds a Ph.D. in Chemical Engineering from MIT and a B. Eng. from McGill University. Mark has been granted nine U.S. patents.
